Individually Assess Each Plan And Offer Optimal Solutions!

We are engaged in the full-service of trading agricultural commodities. Specialized in the supply chain management of the agricultural commodities such as grains, pulses, oil seeds & edible oils, poultry meat, dairy and other soft commodities.

We source, secure, manage, transport, and distribute products through our end-to-end supply chain while minimizing all related costs. We facilitate the movement of goods with a keen market sense and swift efficiency from sourcing commodities from the producing countries to our international customers, from origin and marketing to financing and logistics.

We firmly believes in the sourcing of quality products from the right origin with a view to maintain superiority of the product, its commercial viability in the imported market and its ability to consolidate presence among the final consumer.

Our suppliers from different regions of the world are reputed for their dedication to ethical business practices and adhering to the highest quality standards while having decades of experience in the industry.

We at Oakleaf International Ltd., we value our customers’ needs and is capable of meeting the global demand because of our great values in business through respect, honesty and highest ethical standards. Committed to maintain quality in the products, timely shipments, competitive prices with vast knowledge and hands on experience in trading, finance and logistics of the concerned commodities.

Our Vision:

Our vision is to be the recognized performance leader of the commodities trading. Being a performance leader means we will achieve operational excellence, consistently supplying high quality products that exceed our customers' expectation, industry-leading customer satisfaction and superior financial performance

Dedicated Customer Teams & An Agile Services

Our worldwide presence ensures the timeliness, cost efficiency and compliance adherence required to ensure your production timelines are met.
